text:
Hi Laura. How have you been? 
Did you start school again? 
I start teaching again in a week. 
I saw the Tate Modern Picasso exhibit. Really good! They exhibited a lot more unfamiliar works so it was a fresh look at a specific year in his artistic career. I highly recommend it! I think closes this weekend though. They give student discounts too :wink:
Also, here is a video that explains what the Compositing Role is about in vfx in films and broadcast work.
I will also try to find some on animation, but my speciality is vfx :wink: More videos to follow
In VFX there is the animation department too, so it is part of the entire pipelilne of a specific shot in a films/tv project.

The Five primary jobs of a VFX artist, and how to get one - Glenn Cambell
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KMYKFgUY_ro>
This video might help to explain the main departments.
